mainBoard.flavorText: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

mainBoard.name: Jace's Phantasm
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: If Jace’s Phantasm is dealt lethal damage at the same time as an opponent’s creature, and that creature will become that opponent’s tenth card in their graveyard, Jace’s Phantasm will be destroyed before it gets +4/+4. This is because all creatures that have been dealt lethal damage are destroyed at the same time.

In a multiplayer game, a single opponent must have ten or more cards in their graveyard for the bonus to apply, although this opponent may change over the course of the game. You don’t have to pick a single opponent; the ability will monitor each opponent’s graveyard.
The last ability of Jace’s Phantasm constantly monitors each opponent’s graveyard to see if the bonus applies. If the stated condition becomes no longer true, the bonus immediately stops applying.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.

mainBoard.name: Vedalken Entrancer
mainBoard.originalText: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

foreignData.flavorText: Sceadas sind die kleinen Vettern der Drachen und dienen oft mächtigen Zauberern als zusätzliche Augen und Ohren in der Luft.
foreignData.name: Windsceada
foreignData.text: Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: Un primo menor del dragón, el draco muchas veces es visto junto a poderosos hechiceros que los usan como ojos y oídos voladores.
foreignData.name: Draco del viento
foreignData.text: Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: Petit cousin du dragon, le drakôn est souvent vu en compagnie de puissants sorciers qui les utilisent comme espions aériens.
foreignData.name: Drakôn des vents
foreignData.text: Vol

foreignData.flavorText: Cugini più piccoli del drago, i draghetti vengono spesso visti al fianco di maghi potenti che li sfruttano come occhi e orecchie volanti.
foreignData.name: Draghetto del Vento
foreignData.text: Volare

foreignData.flavorText: ドラゴンの小さな従兄弟であるドレイクは、彼らを空からの目や耳として用いている強力な魔術師の脇に仕えていることがよくある。
foreignData.name: 風のドレイク
foreignData.text: 飛行
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク

foreignData.flavorText: 드레이크는 용과 비슷하지만 덩치가 더 작으며, 강력한 마법사들은 드레이크를 창공의 눈과 귀로 사용한다.
foreignData.name: 바람의 드레이크
foreignData.text: 비행

foreignData.flavorText: Primos menores dos dragões, os dragonetes costumam ser vistos ao lado de poderosos magos que os usam como olhos e ouvidos no céu.
foreignData.name: Dragonete do Vento
foreignData.text: Voar

foreignData.flavorText: Дрейков, малых родственников дракона, часто можно увидеть рядом с могущественными волшебниками, которые используют их как летающие глаза и уши.
foreignData.name: Ветряной Дрейк
foreignData.text: Полет

foreignData.flavorText: 龙兽是龙的远房亲戚，经常在强大法师的身旁出现，充任他们空中的耳目。
foreignData.name: 风龙兽
foreignData.text: 飞行

foreignData.flavorText: 龍獸是龍的遠房親戚，經常在強大法師的身旁出現，充任他們空中的耳目。
foreignData.name: 風龍獸
foreignData.text: 飛行

mainBoard.name: Wind Drake

mainBoard.flavorText:
"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

foreignData.flavorText: „Was auch immer du aus dem Äther ziehen magst, ich lasse es vom Winde verwehen." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Essenzzerstäubung
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Lo que tú tratas de extraer del éter, yo lo puedo dispersar en el viento." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Esparcir la esencia
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ce que tu essaies d'extraire de l'Aether, je peux le disperser aux quatre vents. » —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Dispersion d'essence
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quello che cerchi di ricavare dall'Etere, io posso spargerlo al vento." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Disperdere Essenza
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前が霊気から得ようとしているそれな、私なら風に乗せて飛ばせるんだが。」 ――ジェイス・ベレレン
foreignData.name: 本質の散乱
foreignData.text: クリーチャー呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: "네가 에테르로부터 무엇을 끌어오려고 하던, 난 그것을 바람에 흩날리게 만들 수 있다." —제이스 벨레렌
foreignData.name: 정수 흩날리기
foreignData.text: 생물 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aquilo que você tenta tirar do Éter, eu consigo espalhar no vento." — Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Espalhar Essência
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica de criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Все, что ты попытаешься призвать из Эфира, я развею по ветру». — Джейс Белерен
foreignData.name: Разлет Эссенции
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание существа.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我可将你力图从乙太那里收集的东西散至风中。」～杰斯贝连

foreignData.text: 反击目标生物咒语。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我可將你力圖從乙太那裏收集的東西散至風中。」 ～傑斯貝連
foreignData.name: 菁華離散
foreignData.text: 反擊目標生物咒語。

mainBoard.name: Essence Scatter

rulings.text: A “creature spell” is any spell with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact or enchantment. Older cards of type summon are also creature spells.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"As you inject the *viscus vitae* into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears."
—Stitcher Geralf

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn du den viscus vitae in das Stammhirn spritzt, lass dich nicht vom krampfartigen Stöhnen ablenken. Es wird bald schon Musik in deinen Ohren sein." —Geralf der Näher
foreignData.name: Gedanken ausradieren
foreignData.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Conforme inyectes el viscus vitae en el bulbo raquídeo, que no te molesten los gemidos espásticos. Pronto serán música para tus oídos." —Suturador Geralf
foreignData.name: Depuración de pensamientos
foreignData.text:
El jugador objetivo pone las primeras dos cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Quand vous injectez le viscus vitae dans le cervelet, ne vous laissez pas impressionner par les gémissements incontrôlés. Vous les percevrez rapidement comme une mélodie. » —Raccommodeur Geralf
foreignData.name: Écurage de pensée
foreignData.text:
Le joueur ciblé met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quando inietti il viscus vitae nello stelo del cervello, non ti far distrarre dal lamento spastico. Ben presto sarà musica per le tue orecchie." —Cucitore Geralf
foreignData.name: Rovistapensieri
foreignData.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「脳幹に臓器剤を注入すれば、痙攣性のうめき声など気にならなくなる。すぐに音楽のように聞こえるだろう。」――縫い師、ゲラルフ
foreignData.name: 思考掃き
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "뇌간에 '생명내장'을 주입할 때 신음 소리가 날 수도 있는데, 신경 쓰지 마. 얼마 안 가서 넌 그 소리를 즐기게 될 거야." —봉합술사 게랄프

플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: «Вкалывая жизненные флюиды в мозг, не расстраивайтесь, услышав судорожные стоны. Вскоре они начнут звучать для вас как музыка». — сшиватель Геральф

mainBoard.name: Thought Scour
mainBoard.originalText:
Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Follow the instructions in the order listed on the card: if you target yourself, you’ll put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard and then draw a card.
If the target player is an illegal target when Thought Scour tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t draw a card.

mainBoard.text:
Target player mills two cards.
Draw a card.

mainBoard.name: Divination

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius."
—Jace Beleren

foreignData.flavorText: „Dein Verstand war eine lustige Mischung aus Genie und Wahnsinn. Den Wahnsinn habe ich dir gelassen." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Gedankenformung
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl legt die obersten sieben Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tu mente era una curiosa mezcla de locura y genialidad. Acabo de arrebatarte la genialidad." —Jace Beleren

foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo pone las primeras siete cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ton esprit était un mélange curieux de folie et de génie. Je me suis contenté de prendre le génie. » —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Sculpture mentale
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé met les sept cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: "La tua mente era uno strano miscuglio di genio e follia. Ho semplicemente eliminato il genio." —Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Scolpire Menti
foreignData.text: Un avversario bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime sette carte del suo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「あなたの精神は、狂気と理性が興味深い混在を成していた。私はその理性を取り除いただけだ。」 ――ジェイス・ベレレン

foreignData.name: 정신 조작
foreignData.text: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 일곱 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sua mente era uma curiosa mistura de loucura e genialidade. Eu simplesmente retirei a genialidade." — Jace Beleren
foreignData.name: Esculpir a Mente
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo coloca os sete cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: «Ваш разум был любопытным сочетанием безумия и гениальности. Я стер только гениальность». — Джейс Белерен

foreignData.text: Целевой оппонент кладет семь верхних карт своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你的心灵是疯狂与天才的奇妙组合。我刚把天才的那部份拿走了。」～杰斯贝连

foreignData.name: 心靈塑型
foreignData.text: 目標對手將其牌庫頂的七張牌置入其墳墓場。

mainBoard.name: Mind Sculpt
mainBoard.originalText: Target opponent puts the top seven cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: You can cast Mind Sculpt no matter how many cards are in the opponent’s library. If there are fewer than seven, the opponent will put all of them into their graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
—Garild, merfolk mage

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich gestatte ihnen so wundersame Träume, dass sie zögern, in die Welt der Wachen zurückzukehren." —Garild, Meervolkmagier
foreignData.name: Schlafzauber
foreignData.text: Tappe alle Kreaturen, die ein Spieler deiner Wahl kontrolliert. Diese Kreaturen enttappen während des nächsten Enttappsegments dieses Spielers nicht.

foreignData.flavorText: "Les he dado sueños tan maravillosos que dudan si regresar al mundo consciente." —Garild, hechicero tritón
foreignData.name: Dormir
foreignData.text: Gira todas las criaturas que controla el jugador objetivo. Esas criaturas no se enderezan durante el próximo paso de enderezar de ese jugador.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je leur donne des rêves si merveilleux qu'ils hésitent à revenir dans le monde conscient. » —Garild, mage ondin
foreignData.name: Sommeil
foreignData.text: Engagez toutes les créatures que le joueur ciblé contrôle. Ces créatures ne se dégagent pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de ce joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Do loro sogni così meravigliosi che esitano a ritornare nel mondo cosciente." —Garild, mago tritone
foreignData.name: Dormire
foreignData.text: TAPpa tutte le creature controllate da un giocatore bersaglio. Quelle creature non STAPpano durante il prossimo STAP di quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: 「やつらに夢をくれてやったよ。あまりに素晴らしくて、現実世界へ帰って来たくなくなるやつをな。」――マーフォークの魔道士、ガリルド
foreignData.name: 睡眠
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーがコントロールするすべてのクリーチャーをタップする。それらのクリーチャーは、そのプレイヤーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignData.flavorText: "내가 전해주는 꿈은 너무나도 환상적인 나머지 그들은 깨어 있는 자들의 세계로 돌아오는 것을 망설인다." —인어 마도사 가릴드
foreignData.name: 수면술
foreignData.text: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어가 조종하는 모든 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물들은 그 플레이어의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Dei-lhes sonhos tão maravilhosos que eles hesitaram recobrar a consciência." — Garild, tritão mago
foreignData.name: Dormir
foreignData.text: Vire todas as criaturas que o jogador alvo controla. Estas criaturas não são desviradas durante a próxima etapa de desvirar desse jogador.

foreignData.flavorText: «Я дарю им такие чудесные сны, что они неохотно возвращаются в мир бодрствующих». — Гарилд, мерфолк-волшебник
foreignData.name: Сон
foreignData.text: Поверните все существа под контролем целевого игрока. Те существа не разворачиваются во время следующего шага разворота того игрока.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我给他们的幻梦奇妙无比，让他们舍不得回到清醒的世界。」～人鱼法师加俐得
foreignData.name: 眠梦咒
foreignData.text: 横置由目标牌手操控的所有生物。这些生物于该牌手的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我給他們的幻夢奇妙無比，讓他們捨不得回到清醒的世界。」 ～人魚法師加俐得
foreignData.name: 眠夢咒
foreignData.text: 橫置由目標玩家操控的所有生物。這些生物於該玩家的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。

mainBoard.name: Sleep
mainBoard.originalText: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

rulings.text: The second part of Sleep’s ability affects all creatures the targeted player controls as Sleep resolves, not only the ones that Sleep actually caused to become tapped.

mainBoard.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

mainBoard.flavorText: Say hello to your new friend.

foreignData.flavorText: Begrüße deinen neuen Freund.
foreignData.name: Kehrtwendung
foreignData.text: Tausche die Kontrolle über zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl aus.

foreignData.flavorText: Saluda a tu nuevo amigo.
foreignData.name: Cambiazo
foreignData.text: Intercambia el control de dos criaturas objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Dis bonjour à ton nouvel ami.
foreignData.name: Volte-face
foreignData.text: Échangez le contrôle de deux créatures ciblées.

foreignData.flavorText: Saluta il tuo nuovo amichetto.
foreignData.name: Scambio
foreignData.text: Scambia il controllo di due creature bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 新しいお友達にこんにちはしましょう。
foreignData.name: どんでん返し
foreignData.text: クリーチャー２体を対象とし、それらのコントロールを交換する。

foreignData.flavorText: 새로운 친구와 인사를 나눌 시간이다.
foreignData.name: 바꿔치기
foreignData.text: 생물 두 개를 목표로 정한다. 두 생물의 조종권을 교환한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Diga olá para seu novo amigo.
foreignData.name: Escambo
foreignData.text: Permute o controle de duas criaturas alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Поздоровайся с новым другом.
foreignData.name: Подмена
foreignData.text: Поменяйтесь контролем над двумя целевыми существами.

foreignData.flavorText: 跟你的新朋友打个招呼。
foreignData.name: 私密交换
foreignData.text: 交换两个目标生物的操控权。

foreignData.flavorText: 跟你的新朋友打個招呼。
foreignData.name: 私密交換
foreignData.text: 交換兩個目標生物的操控權。

mainBoard.name: Switcheroo
mainBoard.originalText: Exchange control of two target creatures.

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.
If one of the target creatures is an illegal target when Switcheroo resolves, the exchange won’t happen.
If the same player controls both creatures when Switcheroo resolves, nothing happens.
You don’t have to control either target.

mainBoard.text: Exchange control of two target creatures.
